data.title: üáßüá∑ Brazilian Zip Codes Database
data.meta_description: Database with all postal codes of Correios (Brazilian Post Office). The database covers all addresses, streets, neighborhoods, towns, villages, cities,  and states of Brazil. All data is available to download or consume via APIs (GraphQL or REST).
data.text:
List of postal codes of post offices for Brazil

The Brazil postal code list is a very detailed database with data on the postal codes of Correios do Brasil (Brazilian Post Office). The database provides the zip code Brazil data as follows:

ZIP or Postal Code in alphabetical order (address A to Z)

State

City

Neighborhood

Address (Street, Avenue, etc.)

Number

Additional Information

The Brazil Zip Code database was specially designed to meet the needs of the developer. A developer can perform the following actions with the database:

Clone and make changes to the database

Connect any application to the database

Perform queries and retrieve data from the DB

Download the database in JSON format

Here are some ways in which the developer can benefit from using the Brazil Zip Code number service:

Insert data in autocomplete forms (autocomplete)

Access / retrieve data from different data sources under a single API key (API Key)

Run multiple queries on multiple data sets and centralize the results

Here are some easy to understand examples of the type of information you can retrieve using this database:

ZIP codes by street

Street address by zip code

ZIP codes by State

Search zip codes for an address

Use the web-console link below to obtain an address from a specific zip code. For example, if you enter zip code 01321001 you will get the following answer:

Address found:

Street: Rua Martiniano de Carvalho - odd side

Neighborhood: Bela Vista

Sao Paulo city

State: SP

Search Address by ZIP Code

GitHub Open Source App

Please check the open source project at Github App Brazil Zip Code

Brazilian States Covered

All 27 states of Brazil are part of this database.

List of ZIP Codes in Brazil

This data set provides the following information for each CEP:

CEP in numeric format

State in String format

City in String format

Neighborhood in String format

Address in String format

Number format number

Additional Information in String Format

Example below:

CEP: 01002020

State: SP

City: Sao Paulo

Neighborhood: Centro

Address: Viaduto do Cha

Number:

Additional Information:

Brazil Zip Code Format in Brazil

The Brazilian Zip Code have the following format:

#####-### , for example, 05713-570

On the Zip Code Brasil dataset, we will show postal codes under the following format:

########, for example, 05713570

The Brazil Postal Code Format is the same for all states and regions and each Brazilian ZIP Code number has a meaning. From left to right, the numbers indicate the region, sub-region, sector, sub-sector, sub-sector divider and distribution identifiers (last three digits). Brazil is divided into ten postal regions, which make up the first of the ZIP code numbers:

Region 0 - Greater S√£o Paulo;

Region 1 - Interior of S√£o Paulo;

Region 2 - Rio de Janeiro and Esp√≠rito Santo;

Region 3 - Minas Gerais;

Region 4 - Bahia and Sergipe;

Region 5 - Pernambuco, Alagoas, Para√≠ba and Rio Grande do Norte;

Region 6 - Cear√°, Piau√≠, Maranh√£o, Par√°, Amazonas, Acre, Amap√° and Roraima;

Region 7 - Federal District, Goi√°s, Tocantins, Mato Grosso, Mato Grosso do Sul and Rond√¥nia;

Region 8 - Paran√° and Santa Catarina;

Region 9 - Rio Grande do Sul.

In the case of ZIP Code 05713-570, for example, we can see that the code refers to a Greater S√£o Paulo, since the first digit of the same begins with the number 0. If we analyze each of the other digits according to the criteria established, we will conclude that the ZIP Code refers to the city of Sao Paulo. The last three digits of the code refer to the individual identification of localities, places, special codes and postal units.

Query examples

I will list some query examples you can perform using our API console.

Example 1: What is the Sao Paulo Zip Code?

The query will return 01000-000.
